instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . In the search bar, search for the Be My Eyes app . Tap Install . Tap Open . Review the Be My Eyes Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, then tap I Agree . Complete the individual user setup. Tap Specialized Help and then Google . Tap Call Google . The first time you call, review the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, then tap I Agree . A call begins automatically, connecting you with a Google Disability Support specialist.
